about_the_game:
***Alley Twitch Bot has Rebranded to Alley Chat Bot. This is so we do not use twitch in our bot name and have our own brand.***

Alley Chat Bot is a convenient stream bot for streamers. It's a twitch chat bot that helps you get more effective interaction with audiences. Alley twitch bot will always focus on improving streaming experience.

advantages

● Easy to start you a twitch account for bot name and your main twitch account for the bot to work or you can use your own twitch account to post as the bot.
● Simply to use, no complex setting, clean and fast
● Free to get all features

features


● User Chat Points?
● We have added a points system where viewers can earn point just by watching a streamer.
● Tired Of Answering Repetitive Questions?
● Viewers can type in command to be able to find a simple answer to there questions.
● Chat Dashboard (Be able to see chat in side bot and be able to comment via chat).
● Blacklisted words (Block words that user does not want in chat).
● Cool down timer ( So commands can not be spammed).

Games?


●We have added couple of games to our bot so viewers can earn points We have Coin Flip - Simple Gamble Game and !gamble game there game can help viewers earn more points for the channel to play our games on our bot .


● Want to quickly promote your social account and get more attention?

●You can use timer to periodically push links, announcements, activities, etc.

Custom Categories?


● We have created a system which others don't have (Get Our Alley Chat Bot to see this).

Our Plans



● Quit Settings.
● Change stream information.

update Plans


We plan on doing updates to Alley Chat Bot every month unless we find any bugs then we will publish a update so our users can get a better experience with a bot that is there for them as a stream and not have any problems
detailed_description:
***Alley Twitch Bot has Rebranded to Alley Chat Bot. This is so we do not use twitch in our bot name and have our own brand.***

Alley Chat Bot is a convenient stream bot for streamers. It's a twitch chat bot that helps you get more effective interaction with audiences. Alley twitch bot will always focus on improving streaming experience.

advantages

● Easy to start you a twitch account for bot name and your main twitch account for the bot to work or you can use your own twitch account to post as the bot.
● Simply to use, no complex setting, clean and fast
● Free to get all features

features


● User Chat Points?
● We have added a points system where viewers can earn point just by watching a streamer.
● Tired Of Answering Repetitive Questions?
● Viewers can type in command to be able to find a simple answer to there questions.
● Chat Dashboard (Be able to see chat in side bot and be able to comment via chat).
● Blacklisted words (Block words that user does not want in chat).
● Cool down timer ( So commands can not be spammed).

Games?


●We have added couple of games to our bot so viewers can earn points We have Coin Flip - Simple Gamble Game and !gamble game there game can help viewers earn more points for the channel to play our games on our bot .


● Want to quickly promote your social account and get more attention?

●You can use timer to periodically push links, announcements, activities, etc.

Custom Categories?


● We have created a system which others don't have (Get Our Alley Chat Bot to see this).

Our Plans



● Quit Settings.
● Change stream information.

We plan on doing updates to Alley Chat Bot every month unless we find any bugs then we will publish a update so our users can get a better experience with a bot that is there for them as a stream and not have any problems
name: Alley Chat Bot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel celeron j3060, 1.60GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 5670, 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specs are test specs and have no problems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Needs twitch for this to work
